abstract: Comcast will introduce a new high-speed Internet technology in the Twin Cities area this week.
snippet: Comcast will introduce a new high-speed Internet technology in the Twin Cities area this week.
lead_paragraph: Minnesota sports teams are not known for coming in first. But the Twin Cities are now out in front in at least one respect: Comcast plans to announce Thursday that it is beginning the introduction of a new broadband Internet technology in the Minneapolis-St. Paul region, starting this week.

headline.main: Comcast to Bring Speedier Internet to St. Paul
